description: Create a port for a given tenant.
name: neutron.port.create

allowed_address_pair.description: Allowed address pair associated with the port. "ip_address" parameter is required. IP address or CIDR can be specified for "ip_address". "mac_address" parameter is optional. You can repeat this option.

dns_name.description: Assign DNS name to the port (requires DNS integration extension)

extra_dhcp_opt.description: Extra dhcp options to be assigned to this port: opt_name=<dhcp_option_name>,opt_value=<value>,ip_version={4,6}. You can repeat this option.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

network_id.description: ID or name of the network this port belongs to.

no_allowed_address_pairs.description: Associate no allowed address pairs with the port.

no_security_groups.description: Associate no security groups with the port.

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

qos_policy.description: ID or name of the QoS policy that shouldbe attached to the resource.

security_group.description: Security group associated with the port. You can repeat this option.
